name: Next (itch) (Evert)
description:
A game with an exciting action experience with challenges that require both shooting skills and strategic thinking. Offering a unique experience with unique challenges and smooth gameplay, while it may be short on content, it provides a high dose of excitement and adrenaline in every level.
